sentences.english: This conclusion plays an important theoretical guiding role in ESG designing and testing.
sentences.chinese: 其结论对静电陀螺仪的设计与测试具有理论指导意义。
介绍硅微机械陀螺的研究。

sentences.english: The gyro ball is too low. The height of sinking test is below 6mm.
sentences.chinese: 陀螺球太低，下沉实验高度小于6毫米。

sentences.english: The ball couldn't recognize the top because he looked so different than before.
sentences.chinese: 陀螺看上去跟以前迥然不同，球都认不出他来了。

sentences.english: The developing tendency of fiberoptic gyro is reviewed at last.
sentences.chinese: 最后，评述了光纤陀螺的发展趋势。

sentences.english: The gyroscope in tank is used to stabilize the aim system of the gun.
sentences.chinese: 坦克中的陀螺仪用于稳定火炮的瞄准系统。
这些男孩子正在抽陀螺。

sentences.english: The micro quartz crystal tuning fork gyroscope is a new type of vibratory gyroscope.
sentences.chinese: 石英音叉陀螺是一种新型的振动陀螺。

sentences.english: The micro quartz crystal tuning fork gyroscope is a new type of vibratory gyroscope.
sentences.chinese: 石英音叉陀螺是一种新型的振动陀螺。

sentences.english: This modified formulation is more adaptable to a further study of gyroscopic phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 这种变化后的表达式将更适合于进一步研究陀螺现象。

sentences.english: This gyroscopic motion is called precession.
Check Gyro and Magnetic courses frequently.
sentences.chinese: 经常核对陀螺罗经和磁罗经航向。

sentences.english: Wheels, tops, and the earth rotate.
sentences.chinese: 轮子，陀螺和地球都是旋转体。

sentences.english: The invention discloses a method for increasing the fiber optic gyro scope output precision.
sentences.chinese: 本发明公开一种提高光纤陀螺输出精度的方法。

definition: to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
to swing (one's arms, a heavy object)/to wave (a sword, one's fists)/to fling (money)
to roll/to turn over/to invert/to flip

(martial arts) wind-and-fire wheel, weapon used in hand-to-hand fighting/(Daoism) a magical pair of wheels on which one can stand to ride at great speed, used by Nezha 哪吒[Ne2 zha5]/(fig.) never-ending treadmill
